title: "[TIER-X-YYY] Brief description"
labels: ['tier-X', 'type:feature']
assignees: ''

---

## Tier & Effort
- **Tier:** 1-5 (1=Blocker, 5=Polish)
- **Estimated Effort:** X hours
- **Complexity:** Low/Medium/High

## Description
Brief description of the work to be done.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3
- [ ] Tests passing
- [ ] No regressions

## Files to Modify/Create
- `path/to/file.ts`
- `path/to/file2.tsx`

## Dependencies
- [ ] Issue #XXX (if blocked by another issue)

## Implementation Notes
Optional: Suggestions for how to implement this issue.

## Related Documentation
- Link to audit report if relevant
- Links to related issues

---

**Do NOT proceed if this issue is blocked by dependencies above.**
